pullrequest.title: Smaller green buttons, and make theme default

content.raw: OK now I'm having it interpret empty string as default, but if the user actually wants to save an empty string, it will still work because the code ensures that user-entered stylesheets end in '\n', which distinguishes them from that empty string.
content.html: OK now I'm having it interpret empty string as default, but if the user actually wants to save an empty string, it will still work because the code ensures that user-entered stylesheets end in '\n', which distinguishes them from that empty string.
